div.p: To Dioskourides, archiphylakitês of Krokodilopolis and the (associated?) villages, from Timarchos, son of Krates… Sikyonian. I am being registered into the phylakitai around Krokodilopolis in accordance with the publically posted edict. I ask, therefore, that I be added to the list. Year 1, Pachon 28. (J. Bauschatz, Law and Enforcement, p. 297)
